neighborsGood morning to you Sonny P said they were in Houston this weekend because StanStaci had moved into a new house I told him so did you He sent this reply Hope you have a good day and have a happy Thanksgiving tomorrow I love you Yo Mama Yes you have to make reservations when you go to Huntsville State Parkits a very nice placewe are staying here Thanksgivningwell we are having a Hardee family reunion at the civic center in PoynorPatti and family are here nowStan moved near Beltway and Iin the Spring Branch Memorial school districtoff Gessner Old Oaks St You take the Toll Road Beltway to the west and get off on I and and go towards the city and stay on the feeder road about mile and get off on Gessnerand go about blocks to Old Oaks Sounds like its not too far from Jeffthey need to give each other a hollerStans work number is and home number You might want to forward this to Jeffif you dothen HI JEFFbet you could not hit one as far as you did in Big Sandy that timehahahhaa
